name: Flappy Duck Space Station
description:
Flappy Duck Space Station is an awesome adventure!

The mission is to break into the space station and steal top secret information.

Once you have the information simply touch the screen to lift off and release to descend, the further you get into the mission the higher the score!

Use the Machine Gun to scatter the astronauts, but throughout each game you’ll collect coins and complete missions to earn cash and buy new gear!

Good reflexes are essential to avoid the obstacles in your path including lasers, electricity fields and even guided missiles.

Get a boost using the Space Stomper, Gravity Profit Magnet and out of this world Harley Motorbike and these are just a few of the selection of Space Vehicle pickups available during the mission.

All Space Vehicles available have one touch controls.

Stay alive to complete the mission and lose yourself in Flappy Duck Space Station!
